sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_request">opened_byVALCHANGES^opened_byISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="opened_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="opened_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR Set Company</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

//set org as the requested by org
	
current.company=current.opened_by.company+'';
	


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-29 19:01:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b965f79edb30638050479eb6db9619fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR Set Company</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b965f79edb30638050479eb6db9619fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-06 03:43:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b965f79edb30638050479eb6db9619fa"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_b4addc39db81eb80fe199236db96199b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>SC_Request.ORG</event_name><name>OCIO SR Update Request ORG</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var gr_RITM= new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
gr_RITM.addQuery('sys_id',event.parm1);
gr_RITM.query();
if(gr_RITM.next()){
	    var gr_rec = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
		gr_rec.get(gr_RITM.request);
	    if(gr_rec.company=='')
		gr_rec.company = gr_RITM.variables.u_requested_for.company+'';
		gr_rec.update();	
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-10 00:17:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b4addc39db81eb80fe199236db96199b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR Update Request ORG</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_b4addc39db81eb80fe199236db96199b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-10 00:28:41</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_7801f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961985
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Change Account">d401be25db1f13003d1dd001cf9619a2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Fields From Current User</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-47  27-Jun-2018  James Jose      Initial implementation
 * SB-470 13-Sep-2018  Munhwan Gim     Add today Date
 *
 **/
function onLoad() {

	//Set organization based on the user
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	//Get value from script include at the server side
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);

	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			
			console.info('>>>ChangeAccount, onLoad() = ' + answer);
			
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			
			//Set short description of task
			var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Change Account for '+ retObj.username;
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			//Set Requested for organization
			//g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company);
			
			//g_form.setValue('u_effective_date', "20 Jan 2019");
			g_form.setValue('u_effective_date', retObj.todayDate, retObj.todayDate);
		}
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-14 16:33:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7801f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961985</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Fields From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7801f2a5db1f13003d1dd001cf961985</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 00:10:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Set Default Fields From Current User

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Requested For</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Requested For on Load
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Mathew Kuriakose     Initial implementation  

 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {

var CheckIsMemberOfObj_2 = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.getXML(script_response_2);
 
function script_response_2(response_2) {
	
var script_answer_2 = response_2.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var is_SR= g_user.hasRole('bcgov_sr_service_manager');
	//var is_admin =g_user.hasRole('admin');
	if(g_form.getValue('u_requested_for') ==''&& is_SR==false &&script_answer_2!='true'){
		
		g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',userID);
		
	}
	
	
			}

}			
			
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-30 23:06:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6acdceb44f502300dc6922788310c7c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 04:34:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR populate Org field_REQ</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

//set REQ org as the RITM requested for org

var ritm_sys_id=current.sys_id;
gs.eventQueue('SC_Request.ORG',current, ritm_sys_id,'');
	
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-06 03:57:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>889924e4db052b80fe199236db96190f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR populate Org field_REQ</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_889924e4db052b80fe199236db96190f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-10 23:36:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=889924e4db052b80fe199236db96190f"/></record_update>

 * Set Requested For on Load
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Mathew Kuriakose     Initial implementation  

 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {

var CheckIsMemberOfObj_2 = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.getXML(script_response_2);
 
function script_response_2(response_2) {
	
var script_answer_2 = response_2.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var is_SR= g_user.hasRole('bcgov_sr_service_manager');
	//var is_admin =g_user.hasRole('admin');
	if(g_form.getValue('u_requested_for') ==''&& is_SR==false &&script_answer_2!='true'){
		
		g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',userID);
		
	}
	
	
			}

}			
			
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-04 23:31:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5f03ae4cdb8d278050479eb6db96196f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5f03ae4cdb8d278050479eb6db96196f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 04:38:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_0a72e63adb421300d54b9c78db961979
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sync requested for to REQ</name><order>500</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	syncReqFor();
	
	function syncReqFor(){
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_request");
		gr.get(current.request);
		gr.requested_for = current.u_requested_for;
		gr.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ttanti</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-17 09:24:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0a72e63adb421300d54b9c78db961979</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync requested for to REQ</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0a72e63adb421300d54b9c78db961979</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-09 22:39:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0a72e63adb421300d54b9c78db961979"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e952a73e4f671300c8030fbf9310c737
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-43 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */


var OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper = Class.create();
OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
	
AssignGroup: function() {

var response ='false';	
var myUserObject = gs.getUser();
	
return(myUserObject.isMemberOf('Access Portal Full Catalog')||gs.hasRole('admin'));

},

Sector_Finder: function() {
var parent_company ='';
var company_sys='';
var user_has_company="no";
var return_string ='sys_created_onISEMPTY';
var user_id =gs.getUserID();
var company_id = gs.getUser().getCompanyID();
var current_cart ='';
	
//Check if there is a cart 
var check_cart =new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
check_cart.addEncodedQuery('item_option_new.question_text=Requested For^cart_item.cart.user='+user_id+'^cart_item.cart.name=DEFAULT');
check_cart.query();
if(check_cart.next()){
	
var req_for_user = check_cart.value+'';
var user_rec =new GlideRecord('sys_user');
user_rec.addQuery('sys_id',req_for_user);
user_rec.query();
if(user_rec.next()){
	
user_has_company="yes";
company_sys =user_rec.company;

}
	
if(user_has_company=="yes"&& company_sys!=''){
	
return_string = "company="+company_sys;
	
}	
	
}
	
//No cart evaluate as usual
	
else{
	
if(company_id!=''){
	
var grComp = new GlideRecord('core_company');
	
if (grComp.get(gs.getUser().getCompanyID())) {
	 
user_has_company="yes";
parent_company = grComp.parent;
} 
	
if(user_has_company=="yes"&& parent_company==''){
	
return_string = "company="+company_id;
	
}

if(user_has_company=="yes"&& parent_company!=''){
	
return_string = "company.parent="+parent_company;
	
}
	
}
//	gs.log("return_string "+return_string);

}
return return_string;
},
	
    cart_info: function() {
	var user_id =gs.getUserID();
	var cart_sys = this.getParameter('sysparam_cartID')+'';
	var reqfor_sys =this.getParameter('sysparam_reqFor')+'';
	var OldValue =this.getParameter('sysparam_oldValue')+'';

	var result = this.newItem("result");
    var cart_org='';
	var reqfor_org='';
//First check if there is a cart available 	
		
//check user has any item in Cart
var check_cart =new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
check_cart.addEncodedQuery('item_option_new.question_text=Requested For^cart_item.cart.user='+user_id+'^cart_item.cart.name=DEFAULT');
check_cart.query();
if(check_cart.next()){

//if there is a cart then all the item reqfor should have same org
var cart_req_forsys= check_cart.value+'';
var cart_company = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
cart_company.addQuery("sys_id", cart_req_forsys);
cart_company.query();
if(cart_company.next()){
	
cart_org=cart_company.company;
	
}

var reqfor_company = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
reqfor_company.addQuery("sys_id", reqfor_sys);
reqfor_company.query();
if(reqfor_company.next()){
	
reqfor_org=reqfor_company.company;
	
}
	
if(reqfor_org!=cart_org){
	
	result.setAttribute("cart_old_reqfor",OldValue);
	result.setAttribute("cart_eva_result","invalid");

}
	
}
//No current cart so no evaluation required		
else{
	
	result.setAttribute("cart_eva_result","valid");

}
},
	

type: 'OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper'


});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-31 03:37:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>e952a73e4f671300c8030fbf9310c737</sys_id><sys_mod_count>54</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e952a73e4f671300c8030fbf9310c737</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 04:33:22</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Requested For</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Requested For on Load
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-155 07-July-2018  Mathew Kuriakose     Initial implementation  

 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request Project  
 **/
function onLoad() {

var CheckIsMemberOfObj_2 = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj_2.getXML(script_response_2);
 
function script_response_2(response_2) {
	
var script_answer_2 = response_2.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var is_SR= g_user.hasRole('bcgov_sr_service_manager');
	//var is_admin =g_user.hasRole('admin');
	if(g_form.getValue('u_requested_for') ==''&& is_SR==false &&script_answer_2!='true'){
		
		g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',userID);
		
	}
	
	
			}

}			
			
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-04 23:28:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2882e24cdb8d278050479eb6db9619d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2882e24cdb8d278050479eb6db9619d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 04:38:14</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Requested for Read Only</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-366 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */

function onLoad() {
	
var CheckIsMemberOfObj = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.getXML(script_response);
 
function script_response(response) {
	
var script_answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
if(script_answer == 'true')
{
    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);
}

else{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);

}
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mkuriako</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-17 02:32:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Requested for Read Only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ce9672544f042300c8030fbf9310c77b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-11 00:13:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
